The six classes of rebirth according to: Someone born into a dark class gives rise to a dark result
Someone born into a dark class gives rise to a bright result
Someone born into a dark class gives rise to extinguishment, which is neither dark nor bright
Someone born into a bright class gives rise to a dark result
Someone born into a bright class gives rise to a bright result
Someone born into a bright class gives rise to extinguishment, which is neither dark nor bright
The conditions for someone born into a d: Poor, with little to eat or drink, where life is tough, and food and shelter are hard to find
Ugly, unsightly, deformed, chronically ill—one-eyed, crippled, lame, or half-paralyzed
Do bad things by way of body, speech, and mind (for dark result)
Do good things by way of body, speech, and mind (for bright result)

Shave off their hair and beard, dress in ocher robes, and go forth from the lay life to homelessness. Give up the five hindrances, corruptions of the heart that weaken wisdom. Firmly establish their mind in the four kinds of mindfulness meditation. Truly develop the seven awakening factors (for extinguishment)
The conditions for someone born into a b: Rich, affluent, and wealthy, with lots of gold and silver, lots of property and assets, and lots of money and grain
Attractive, good-looking, lovely, of surpassing beauty
Do bad things by way of body, speech, and mind (for dark result)
Do good things by way of body, speech, and mind (for bright result)

Shave off their hair and beard, dress in ocher robes, and go forth from the lay life to homelessness. Give up the five hindrances, corruptions of the heart that weaken wisdom. Firmly establish their mind in the four kinds of mindfulness meditation. Truly develop the seven awakening factors (for extinguishment)
